website_summaries.verdict: Challenge yourself to come up with a winning strategy on a large scale with this giant version of the loved classic. Big fun for all ages puts it at the top of our list.
pros: Attractive wooden construction and quality craftsmanship with 3-inch pawns
Not too difficult to set up and take down
Can be used indoors and outdoors
Comes with a convenient storage/carry case
cons: Expensive, and takes up a bit of space compared to the tabletop versions

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Do not buy! Came with a nail sticking out of leg and chipped wood on gameboard. Contacted sellers, they sent new gameboard, no new sides. Bottom broke 2 weeks later after one use. I would give zero stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Checkers don’t line up, they overlap and becomes extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great concept but unfortunately some of the checkers are too tight to get in easily and in some parts of the board the checkers over lap so they won’t stay in place. It ends up frustrating and everyone stops playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I would actually give 4 1/2 stars as the quality of each parts is not top notch but acceptable for its price. I believe it should deliver its purpose 1) large enough, not too large, my 2-year-old twin babies are having fun (not actually playing connect-4, but more like drop-4) 2) portable. You can easily dis-assemble, pack, and take it 3) wood frame and body 4) each drop makes EXTREMELY loud 'bang' noise. This might bother many people in-door, but oh well, my babies seem to love the definitive drop effect. cons: a bit flimsy but OK. conclusion: You can definitely get people's attention when you play outdoor... I think, and there will be no problem finding your playmate.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S

customer_reviews.title: like the game but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Cool game to have.... but it arrived broken!! I didn't want to send it back because I bought it to use this weekend so I use some liquid nail glue and a few wood screws and it's just like new. I would have given five stars if it would not have arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD: This is everything
customer_reviews.text: GOOD: This is everything! The pellets are smooth and the wood is beautiful. I played a round with my brother and maybe it's because I won, but this was a good purchase~ nice size, great design (I did not want the typical model) and it is very, very easy to assemble. BAD: As I've seen noted by others, the pucks are loud as they smack into each other. If sound is an issue for you, this is going to be loud. Also...it is a little too expensive for such a simple game, but it is well-made. Haven't seen how it does being stored outside in the rain etc. but from the looks of it, it's best to store indoors.
customer_reviews.author: wishuponastar

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun For All!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! We bought it for the kids but my husband and I stayed up until 1am playing!! It was a hit at our party! Great quality. Yes, you can hit the bar and release the discs but it hasn't happened to us and wouldn't be a big deal if it did! Totally worth it! So glad we got it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rechel B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality workmanship
customer_reviews.text: B-day gift for wife. Loves it. Good quality workmanship, fits together nice. The plastic coating on the wood pucks is durable and haven't had any issues. Only bad thing I have is the noise of the falling pucks as that means we cannot play after the little one is in bed as we would likely wake her up, but that is minor, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Olson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The disks stuck and did not slide so unable to successfully complete game. Retured product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly but nice materials...
customer_reviews.text: The game is made from quality material, however it doesn't fit together well...very wobbly. Also don't like that the entire bottom piece has to be removed to start a new game....should have been a hinge of sorts attached. The legs are solid but waaay too much play once they're slid onto the gameboard. I would return it but it's too much trouble. I'll just have my husband go to the hardware store and pickup a few dollars worth of supplies to make this game solid and sturdy for years of family and friends coming over to play.
customer_reviews.author: Teena M.

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun in the Sun! C-19 won't still my joy all summer!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is a HIT for the family! We used it for the first time on the 4th of July and everyone's still talking about it...so much fun and easy to operate. Very well made and very sturdy. Set u hgv break down is quick & easy. And the tote bag is great storage to keep your wooden set looking nice for years to come. Hope you try it and love it as much as we do. I am not getting paid for this review, thought I'd share my view on the things I truly believe in. Be well, be safe because better days are coming soon!
customer_reviews.author: Being Bee Battle

customer_reviews.title: Best Money Spent In A Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: This game has provided many hours of fun for family and friends. The first day I received this, my son and husband played for 4 hours straight. It is a super competition and makes you think several moves ahead. Best money I have spent in a long time. The game is constructed well. I will have to see how well it stands up over time.
customer_reviews.author: D McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to receive this for use at our company picnic as both a giveaway and gameplay day of. At first glance it seemed great, but as we unwrapped what seemed like a well packaged product, we noticed the corner piece had fallen off. Due to time constraints, I just glued it back in, but when I put it in the carry bag, I realized one of the pocket flaps is only half connected (and the leg corners are all dinged)! It's a great concept and looks good from afar, but for the cost it should have been shipped a bit better. I should have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Olson Biondo

customer_reviews.title: This game was an absolute hit at my daughter's sweet sixteen! The giant connect 4 was missing the ...
customer_reviews.text: This game was an absolute hit at my daughter's sweet sixteen! The giant connect 4 was missing the very bottom piece to keep all the game pieces in. However, after contacting Kevin at YardGames they overnighted the piece to us to have in time for the party!! Thank you so much Kevin!! We will continue to recommend your products and will be a repeat shopper in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Well built and comes with carry case
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and comes with carry case. This item is so much fun and the kids love it! In order to take the colored disks out you have to remove a wood bar on the bottom. The elementary school aged children are able to do that quite well without any problems. When they fall out above a hard surface like a table or wood or other type of hard flooring it does make a lot of noise however. The game board is made of wood and the disk are solid plastic. It should hold up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Fake in it

customer_reviews.title: Love this large size connect four
customer_reviews.text: Love this large size connect four. Played on a very large outdoor set at a resort on vacation and our grandson (6), was kicking everyone’s butt. He loved it. So we bought this one a very happy with quality and price. Now I’m practicing for his next visit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, but loud.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase. This item looks great and was easy to assemble. Loved that it was wood. The only thing I would say is that it is quite loud when the 'discs' are dropped into the game because of the 'wood on wood' clanging. Would be great if there was some sort or rubber bumper that could be added. And a tray underneath for catching them all when they are released at the end. Which is again loud. If it wasn't for the sound problem, I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun! It is all built but it is transportable so slides out of the legs very easily. You can set up and break it down within seconds. We have had so much fun! You pull a piece of wood to allow all the pieces to fall out. The only minor issue is it is loud. Dropping each piece can hurt your ears in a loud room. The carrying case is amazing. It has pockets for the pieces and legs. I was impressed with the quality. I’ve loved this game since I was a kid but it’s great at any age and has really taught my kids to think ahead!
customer_reviews.author: O. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Great for Groups, too
customer_reviews.text: We bought this "giant" game for the kids. But the adults "hijacked" it. The adults liked playing it in teams, e.g., each member of a team would take a turn. To make it a challenge, each member of the team would not be allowed to see the game until it was his/her turn. When it was his/her turn, they would see the ongoing game for the first time. Other members of the team would not be allowed to "help" until the disc was released. It was great to watch each team member struggle with the board when the saw what the teammates had done. This provided hours of fun. Will get another one for larger groups. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis I.

customer_reviews.title: Well built nice looking game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the family to play with when we all get together. Everyone enjoyed it. I was impressed with how well built it was. The disks are very heavy duty. My only complaint is how noisy the disks are when dropped together, I wish they were more light weight so they don't make so much noise. But still a great game!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better when it comes to classic games!
customer_reviews.text: This game is SO much fun! Brought it out camping this weekend, and my brother had the best comment- "at first I thought, why would you need a giant connect 4? Then I played it, and I realized why! It's so much fun!!" Game is made really well, gorgeous hard wood and sturdy blue and red chips. The travel bag is a great accessory too.
customer_reviews.author: AMomOnTheRun

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved and me too!
customer_reviews.text: Previously complained that item as received was missing included carrying case. Then noticed that case came in separate box--stupid of me and apologies. Great toy and keeps even high strung grand kids 4,4,and 7 occupied for hours, well at least 1. Easy to assemble and made to last. High enough that I can sit in a chair to play. Good value when I bought; price has risen since but still a fair deal.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Beder

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this intending it to be a fun outdoor BBQ game for my teens and their friends. It has turned into a full living room high stakes smackdown, complete with trash talking and game variations (including blindfolds, rolling dice to see your next move, etc). It's been an unexpected source of low tech fun. It has also held up really well, and the carrying case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV camping
customer_reviews.text: Giant Connect 4 game! We bought it for camping and it did NOT disappoint. The only thing I would change is the chips, they are plastic and I wish they were wood pieces. But then it would be a pretty heavy set. The main piece of the board is pretty thin and I can see that being first to break. But it did the job - it’s FUN!
customer_reviews.author: BowtieWill

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I love the game Connect 4 and would play it with each other online when we're apart. I bought this for our 2 year anniversary and he loves it! We play it here and there and it is worth the money, it is a little loud though so take the wood falling down on wood noise into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Danitza

customer_reviews.title: Nice game.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game and big enough to make it really fun. Kind of expensive but it is high quality, you're getting substantial pieces. The frame is wood and not "all weather" - you shouldn't expect this to survive if you leave it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Dan'l

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in pieces
customer_reviews.text: Mine just arrived. Some of it in pieces. They don’t pack it well and the frame is thin. So disappointed. I read similar reviews and hoped for the best. There are others to choose from. I would not purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: It's far from giant. Not really kid friendly. All said I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: "Giant" is misleading this is a tabletop game, not a freestanding version like you may find at outdoor bars. It's Ok but all of my outdoor tables are glass top and if you let these super hard plastic game pieces fall at the end of game it could shatter the glass. I no longer use it as it really wasn't what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: djjohns

customer_reviews.title: This game is fun in this large size
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun in this large size. We have used it in our home and for parties. We set it on a table, and found that it will draw a crowd and make playing more fun. Made well, worth the money. Comes with a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: stamperer

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our outdoor patio space. Arrived without damage with all pieces. Very easy to assemble by myself in a matter of minutes. It has been great fun for our family which includes a 11 year old boy plus grandparents. The board and pieces are sturdy and well-made. The wooden frame looks very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome game for the whole family. Great yard game for adult game nights and kids parties!! Super nice finished wood. Put together in 2 min and dissasembled and bagged in the same time. Red & Blue chips made from solid plastic. Nicely boxed and bubble wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Master Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Just too flimsy for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: We set this up at a campsite, and after the first day, the bottom piece came loose. Since we were camping, we had limited stuff on hand to repair it with, so duct taped it in place, which of course meant we had to tip it over to get the discs out. Once the tape gave out, we packed it away out of frustration. When we pulled it out of storage this year to repair, the wood on the "body" of the game had warped such that a disc could no longer drop cleanly to the bottom. It's really a shame - people love this game, but this set just isn't engineered to last.
customer_reviews.author: FK McClure

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This yard game is a hit!!! It is worth the money. My niece and nephews have been entertained for at least an hour now. The only change I would suggest is for the red pieces to be shaved down a bit more. The red pieces don’t insert smoothly into the game’s frame. The blue pieces are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper M.

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: The game comes in a storage bag. The wooden frame is easy to set up.. My 6 yr old sets it up by herself. The round colored pegs are plastic and light weight. the game is fun, easy to set up, & easy to put away. I would strongly recommend to my friends and even enemies... This will make friends out of everybody....
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Nudo

customer_reviews.title: Best Company support and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this yard game in 2018. One of the game pieces were lost. I contacted the company, and they were responsive within 24 hours. They are replacing the missing piece at no charge. Not many companies would do that. Great customer service, and super support.
customer_reviews.author: CJR

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play, seems fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Size is as expected and fun to play. I just opened and the wood is cheap. Paint is coming off and I havent used it once. Ot seems its missing tile piece because there is always one piece unused. I know blue and red should have the same amount but it would have been better to have an extra one rather than missing one. Overall it is a fun game, a little bit overrpiced for the quality in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Samba Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF FUN
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying playing this game with the grand kids. Lots of fun. Only extra I would like would be if they sold replacement discs for when we lose one - grand kids are great about playing with them at places other than the game.
customer_reviews.author: Happy-Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Read Reviews
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took the frame out the box a broken piece of wood fell off. Should of read the reviews first. Will return. Poor construction. Can't let the kids at school play with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rayjanette Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect backyard/firepit chill game - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, love the size of this thing! We've had a lot of use of this in our backyard already & it's holding up great! My only criticism would be that you can't pick it up from the top as there is no lock for the legs & it just pulls/slides right out of the legs - so you have to grab it by the legs if you are going to move it around. Other than that nit-picky little thing - we love this game & we may end up purchasing more of them because there is always a line of people waiting to play :)
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. White

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to play it as do the adults. It's great fun for whole group. However less than 1 month and 40-50 games later the bottom rack cracked. It's made of thin balsa wood.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaTackittLong

customer_reviews.title: It was great for a few months but then the entire middle ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a few months but then the entire middle section where the chips go expanded (the wood is not finished like the edges) and now all the chips just overlap and fall to the bottom. Kind of a bummer as it worked well when we got it but the quality of the finish is just not there.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jay

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, but really loud as it turns out
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING, but really loud as it turns out, when you drop those pucks in they make quite a bang! Great conversation piece if I ever saw one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My family absolutely loves this game; we play it ...
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely loves this game; we play it all the time. over the weekend one of my grandsons misplaced a few of the pieces. I found all but one which I'm sure I'll come across it since he wasn't too far out of the area during the time it came up missing. But I was wondering if I could purchase a few extra game pieces in case this happens again.
customer_reviews.author: Tarrita Spicer

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of FUN
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an outdoor picnic to have something additional to do and wow was it a hit. Kids and adults had a blast with connect four. Would recommend and glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Jo Jazudek

customer_reviews.title: Great initially...
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit with friends and family, unfortunately after only the 3rd use it started falling apart. We were able to fix it but for the price you would think it would last a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: A little decorating fun. I put it in the spare bedroom. Great when people bring there kids or grandchildren. Has a storage bag of you want to take it with you.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this for our wedding reception... the guests LOVED it! We had a few giant yard games outside of the reception building for anyone that didn't want to spend all night inside or didn't want to dance, and we are so happy with our purchase! This is definitely worth the money—the wood is absolutely beautiful as well as sturdy. The assembly is extremely easy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun with this yard game, it’s great for adults and kids! !! It’s great! Very sturdy and i love the bag to store for future use. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun & love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use at our cigar & beer bar. Really good quality- sturdy and hours of fun for our customers. We have had this over a year now and it’s still in great condition in a commercial setting!
customer_reviews.author: KELLY LAMURE

customer_reviews.title: Kids and teens love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our outdoor wedding. We have a game area set up (corn hole, etc.) and this is a perfect addition. Tweens and teens have already played multiple matches against each other!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Good Quality Game
customer_reviews.text: The game is very sturdy of good quality material and nice color scheme. We have a pool and when we have guest over we take out our outdoor games for additional fun. Many hours of enjoyment outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: G. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: This was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome! It is well constructed and functions perfectly. The case that it come with is excellent. I can’t recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: MaRiA

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: The game was awesome. I love that your brand had a luggage bag that it can be put in so we can take it on trips to the beach or camping.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Burnes

customer_reviews.title: Great game, almost well-made. Sent with pre-existing crack prior to shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Connect 4 arrived on time and with all its parts. It's made of wood with easy to assemble parts. All items seem well-made. However, one of the main leg supports was shipped cracked. You can tell by the picture that this happened before staining the leg where glue and sanding took place. The crack is substantial and I'm saddened that the retailer would send on a product that was knowingly damaged before shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Not as Tall as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a party and people had fun with it. One of the girl's at the party borrowed it for her afternoon outdoor wedding the next weekend. Great construction! Shorter than I thought, I obviously didn't look at height. Just make sure you have a table or a long enough bench to set it on. Also, if it's windy at all it will blow over.
customer_reviews.author: BJING

customer_reviews.title: Great Game! Very well made!  Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made game and out of wood (the blue and red pieces are made of plastic)... the perfect size. Kids love it! ** I just saw some reviews state that the game arrived broken... but ours arrived just fine. It was packaged surrounded by styrofoam and everything was just perfect! **
customer_reviews.author: Dream Achiever

customer_reviews.title: seems solid
customer_reviews.text: I cant state what the durability is going to be like since its a new purchase. The size is great for an outside party
customer_reviews.author: KNBishop

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun in or outside
customer_reviews.text: Absolute blast for all ages. We bought several games to play outside with the kids and love the quality of this game. Easy to set-up and pack up (comes with easy-to-store case/bag). Good packaging and prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: OnTheGoV

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: We use this at our campsite, great and fun game! My grandkids and grown kids have a blast. Easy to assemble, and take down. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun - Sturdy - Easy assemble and storage
customer_reviews.text: I very seldom write reviews, but after reading some of the other reviews on this product I decided I would write to give my two thumbs up on this vendor. The product arrived packaged very well and all the pieces were in good condition. I really appreciate the storage bag and the convenience. I ordered it for a family picnic and everyone enjoyed it. I would highly recommend it for all...younger children and older adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to store , use it at our restaurant and kids love it and parents get to enjoy there food while kids playing .
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this purchase more than I thought I would. Beautifully stained wood and the coins are great quality as well. Very light (and extremely easy) assembly required (with no tools). The only downside to this purchase is that each of the coins comes individually wrapped so there's a lot of plastic and it takes some time to open them all. Other than that I think it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy... wish there was a pad in bottom. Hurts your ears. I really am surprised that this was not corrected in production.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I would not consider this “yard” or “giant”.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice; however, I should have read the dimensions. The description said “ yard” and “giant” and I thought it was getting the 4ft connect four. So I was disappointed in the size. However, it is nice but needs put on a table top for adults. Read the details before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Overall Happy but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I was happy with the purchase of 4 Connect in a Row. My Kids, friends and I all enjoy the game and have fun playing. However, several of the discs were swollen and do not fit easily through the slats and therefore do not easily fall through. I have been able to set these aside for the most part, but it is still an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built. Looks hand made but the cost is really high! The only reason we purchased was because our son loves Connect Four and it was a birthday gift. Typically we would have not paid this much for something like this. So far it's held up well though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy product.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this purchase. Very flimsy product. We had this sitting on flat concrete and it tipped over multiple times. Easy assembly though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality. One of the legs was broken upon ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply built, poor quality. One of the legs was broken upon arrival and the bottom of the game is poorly constructed. Returning asap
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at the party
customer_reviews.text: Used all day by kids ages 6 - 18 and despite being dropped off a 3 foot high table numerous times, held up great!
customer_reviews.author: George Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment/purchase. The whole family aged 6-80 loved playing this at our outdoor parties this year!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: A BIT HESITANT AT FIRST...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to pay so much for this yard game, but once I put it together (taking out the discs one by one from each plastic baggie was the toughest) It stands nicely outside and appears to be sturdy and well made. Yeah it's noisy but it is outside! Love the wood color!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied!!!  But it is not a yard game!
customer_reviews.text: This yard game met almost all of my expectations! Great product with storage case included. Loved everything about it. I placed on a table so it was a good size, but this item is not a yard game, as it is not as large as you think. But it is a good size once you put it on a table. And it's definitely significantly larger than the original Connect4! I absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kar Kar HR

customer_reviews.title: Happy gamers!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item because it's not obnoxiously large the the other oversized connect 4 options. It's in an attractive wood material, not a cheap looking plastic. Very pleased with the quality!!! It even disassembles for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging and storage included. Fun to play, easy to storage. We will have years of enjoyment. Sturdy and well made!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Petway

customer_reviews.title: It’s wood! Nice product. Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Big backyard hit! But with southeastern Florida’s muggy moisture & heat, it comes apart & nails do not hold it firmly together - will need to have wood glue on hand for quick, easy repair
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the quality, to expensive for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.text: It has lots of scratches and nails popping out , not a good quality , and it had a crack right on the middle. It’s not a good product to play with kids because seems that they don’t polish the wood and there are bunch of little sticks sticking out and will definitely hurt ur self , I order a replacement and it was worst
customer_reviews.author: kathelyn lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but....
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, but it is much smaller than I expected and extremely loud when you drop the tiles in to play.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Families that enjoy backyard loving need this game
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed with this yard game, it was a hit at our open house party and was the most popular game. We have put it to good use, it’s a fun addition to our backyard
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Niel

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love playing with it, great adult game. Everyone over it! Sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's very loud dropping the pieces in but I'll layer something down there if possible.
customer_reviews.author: SheRah

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolute fun! I have a family of 5 and and other family and friends- who come over has a good time playing with this human size Connect four- like game! The bag is sturdy but we haven’t carried it long distance anywhere, just from the room to the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Morin

customer_reviews.title: Giant Connect 4
customer_reviews.text: All wood and plastic insert round connect four red/blue, love it! Great for our lawn, definitely should bring inside if raining, because it's wood, love how easy to set up, the handy bag it came in, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after a couple weeks. Save your money. I bought two and they are both done.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Carey

customer_reviews.title: Just Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, and it stores well. I only gave it 4 stars for durability, because we have only had it a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Bennita

customer_reviews.title: Fun To Be Had
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves a classic especially outdoor on your deck or patio or floating deck octagon. We love to have game days outside with BBQs in the mix. This is also a good drinking game too, with sweet teas or Arnold Palmers. ~SeviSeki has spoken... 💜💜🤍💜💜✝♿👩🏾‍🦽💎🛍
customer_reviews.author: Sevida

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Super cool product for the price. My 6th grade students love playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mellor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to slide the wood piece in and out. Seems very sturdy, and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Aspiring Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Game night
customer_reviews.text: Giant connect 4 made my game night. Thank you, this is a must have for a game night.
customer_reviews.author: Tendesai Chieza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing yard party game!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most popular game at our party! It is awesome! Well made and so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: lisa lavictoire

customer_reviews.title: Great on the deck!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun on the deck. Well built, standing up to weekend use well. Only tiny thing is the noise the pieces make when ejected onto a table top, as an old girlfriend once told me put a towel and it'll be ok and it was, muffles the sound
customer_reviews.author: Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Get it you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb buy it makes the miniature four in a row look and feels like child play.. It’s wonderful and super easy to assemble/disassemble and carrying bag is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Lake sxm

customer_reviews.title: came unbroken and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: this came perfectly packaged and unbroken! i thought it was going to come cracked from looking at past reviews but it’s absolutely perfect. it’s an awesome size to play outside too. great quality and looks so expensive! my little brother is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: cassie u.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: For all ages my 1 year old grandson love this the whole family had a great time🎉
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Price

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Lots of fun for the kids in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lots of fun for the kids in our youth program. Made well and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Palladino

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! The connect four game was well made and the carrying case was an added bonus! It was a hit at our outdoor party and everyone asked where they could get one. I would give 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size, love the wood
customer_reviews.text: Great size, love the wood. The only thing with this particular connect four is it is VERY LOUD when you drop the red/blue piece done, when the red/blue piece makes contact with the wood...it makes a very loud sound on impact. Not for inside play...in my opinion. Great for outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Karessa

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! Do not buy! It doesn’t slide in all the way. A piece of wood was stuck in it, keeping it from being able to slide all the way down on one side. Look at my picture to see how uneven it stands. To make it even worse, it’s dirty and damaged! The quality of it is also not worth the price of it.
customer_reviews.author: Creighton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow, love this. I think the price should be closer to $60 but I love it. Played with, arrived on time, has a carrying case, and very durable pons to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Halley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with flaws (chips/scratches)
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived flawed - too much trouble to pack up and send back or I would - comes with real nice storage bag and really easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Karen Parks

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box and saw the wood. The unit is very attractive and sturdy. I ordered it for the break room for work and the other units I looked at were plastic. This one is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Game pieces are easy to handle for small kids.
customer_reviews.text: My grands (ages 3 -4) love this game. They may not fully get the concept but love putting in the discs and watching them slide down.
customer_reviews.author: a reader too

product_meta.title: Giant 4 Connect in a Row with Carrying Case and Stained and Finished Legs and Frame
feature_bullets: Durable giant wooden board 31" x 23" made with premium wood and finished with natural stain. Game stands 2.5 feet tall.
Complete wooden construction with beautifully finished legs, frame and bottom bar make for a perfect addition to any gathering which will entertain friends and family for hours
Includes durable nylon carrying case which holds the 42 solid plastic coins, 21 red and 21 blue measuring 3.5" diameter for perfect game play and sliding action.
Giant game is easy to set up indoors our outside and easily transportable and zips up with easy handles and pockets to fit all of your game pieces
100% Satisfaction Guaranteed. We are a US based company and will replace any piece of this game if you are not satisfied. Or if it's just not working out, send it back for a full refund.
